mapper.insert: insert into quark_advertisement (imgUrl, webPageUrl, info, telephone, label, endDate, status, advLocation, userId, startDate, dailyStartTime, dailyEndTime, name) values (#{imgUrl}, #{webPageUrl}, #{info}, #{telephone}, #{label.id}, #{endDate}, #{status}, #{advLocation}, #{userId}, #{startDate}, #{dailyStartTime}, #{dailyEndTime}, #{name})
mapper.update: update quark_advertisement set name=#{name}, dailyEndTime=#{dailyEndTime}, dailyStartTime=#{dailyStartTime}, startDate=#{startDate}, imgUrl=#{imgUrl}, webPageUrl=#{webPageUrl}, info = #{info}, telephone = #{telephone}, label=#{label.id}, endDate=#{endDate}, status=#{status}, advLocation=#{advLocation} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select imgUrl, webPageUrl, info, telephone, label, endDate, status, advLocation, userId, label, startDate, dailyStartTime, dailyEndTime, name from quark_advertisement
select imgUrl, webPageUrl, info, telephone, label, endDate, status, advLocation, userId, label, startDate, dailyStartTime, dailyEndTime, name from quark_advertisement where label = #{label}
select imgUrl, webPageUrl, info, telephone, label, endDate, status, advLocation, userId, label, startDate, dailyStartTime, dailyEndTime, name from quark_advertisement where userId = #{userId}
